Hi

I'm looking for informations about events in Europe (or better Switzerland
/ Germany) to study nihontos. Is there any Informations-Source on the web
especially for Europe ? I heard about a Europen Branch of the NBTHK. Does
anyone know the adress ?

I havn't found yet any location here in Switzerland, where I could appreciate
nihontos.

Thank's for your help.

Regards

Ricci
